System Associate.job_description: Provide system and network support for internal teams. Responsible for maintaining servers, troubleshooting hardware/software issues, and ensuring IT operations run smoothly.

Software Developer.job_description: Design, develop, and maintain software applications using Java or Python. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver efficient, clean, and scalable code.

Web Developer.job_description: Develop responsive web pages and dynamic websites using front-end and back-end technologies like React and Node.js. Ensure website performance and cross-browser compatibility.

Frontend Developer.job_description: Create engaging, responsive user interfaces using React and modern UI frameworks. Work closely with designers to enhance user experience and application performance.

Backend Developer.job_description: Build and maintain server-side logic, APIs, and database systems. Collaborate with frontend teams to integrate APIs and optimize performance.

Full Stack Developer.job_description: Develop both client and server sides of web applications. Manage frontend design, backend logic, and deployment on free hosting platforms.

Data Analyst.job_description: Analyze and interpret complex data sets using Python, SQL, and BI tools. Build dashboards, visualize data, and provide actionable insights to stakeholders.

Machine Learning Intern.job_description: Assist in developing and testing machine learning models. Work on preprocessing, feature engineering, and evaluating algorithms using Python.

IT Support Engineer.job_description: Provide technical support, resolve IT-related issues, and maintain network systems. Ensure smooth operation of hardware, software, and server components.

Digital Marketing Executive.job_description: Plan and execute online marketing campaigns. Use SEO and paid advertising to drive website traffic and improve conversion rates.

UI/UX Designer.job_description: Design user-friendly interfaces and wireframes for applications. Conduct user research, create prototypes, and collaborate with developers for implementation.

Cloud Support Associate.job_description: Support and monitor cloud-based infrastructure. Assist in deployments, troubleshoot virtual environments, and ensure uptime and security of cloud services.
